review: Maybe I haven't figured out how to use all of the features but it seems like this just turns your tv into a smart tv. Yes, you can access movies but you have to pay for them. review: I bought this because our 2011 LG HDTV Amazon ap was no longer going to be supported.  I wish I hadn't waited so long!  It is much faster and more reliable than the TV app.  I had read some comments about not finding the free Prime TV shows and movies.  These are already sorted for you so there is no trouble finding them right from the start screen.  I've been very happy so far (couple of weeks)

review: I was previously using Chromecast and bought this just because it was on sale. It very quickly became the only one I used. I love having the remote. I wish it had some other apps like HBO now and apps for some cable TV stations but I think that will come in time.
